releases.release: Pre-release to test GitHub pages functionality

component-info.title: Common component: Shared libraries and IDE support
component-info.summary: `xtpxlib-common` is `xtpxlib`'s communal component. Most other `xtpxlib` components rely on it. It contains: * XSLT libraries, with functionality for handling parameters, manipulating filenames/URIs, MIME types, etc. * Parts of the functionality of the XSLT libraries were translated into XQuery. * XProc (1.0) steps, implementing things like recursive directory lists, tee, creating ZIP files from directories, etc. * Templates (empty XSLT, XProc, XQuery, etc. files) for use in the oXygen IDE.
